title: Towers feel like a fly trap and ADC are the flies
body: They hover about believing they can safely cs, only to get dove and killed under a false sense of security.

replies.body: This is pretty much every class though TBH, but ADCs definitely have it the worst.
Agreed. At least people hesitate for bruisers or tanks or end up punished for supports and mages. ADCs got nothing to save them from inevitable dives.
{{champion:40}} {{champion:117}}: "We used to save ADCs from those inevitable dives, but that slowed the snowball meta, so our items and our shields got nerfed."
Dont remind me. :( I miss legitimate supports. I dont even remember the last time I saw thresh or blitz even. Its all damage supports now.
Well blitz or thresh werent played for ages. When Lulu and Janne were ruling over the rift with their AA Bots, tanky supports werent around for the most part.
You must not remember Volibear and Maokai being the highest win rate tank supports a few seasons back. I'm thinking S4.

why the fuck are you bringing season 4? this is so unrelated that its crazy. 
Im clearly talking about THIS season. Tanky supports went completely extinct this year.

Not true. Blitz/thresh were plenty common with janna/lulu because they inherently counter janna/lulu. Particularly blitzcrank who pulls them to him and keeps them CC'd long enough that it's hard for them to turn it around. Alistar/leona got shoved out for a short while but were back when aftermath was completely over tuned.
To be fair (and I say this as a mastery 7 Janna), Janna is still a strong pick even after these nerfs. Lulu could use some help, tho.

I think Janna is still a strong pick for those who have experience with her; the nerfs raised her skill floor a bit as you need to get good at using your E at the last possible moment (as well as knowing when using it will result in a long duration AD buff for the target).

The decaying shield really hurts against assassins (or anything that can 100-0) as it only has full strength for a fraction of a second. On the flip side, the ease of removal of her shield due to decay means it is slightly less valuable as a buff to your ADC's AD and as such, it feels slightly less bad to use on other teammates as an anti-burst mechanism.

Also /highfive fellow M7 Janna!
And we, adc mains, will always love the enchanters players.

> [{quoted}](name=Ayame Isaki,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8ffxaE41,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-09T16:39:51.106+0000)
>
> {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}}: "We used to save ADCs from those inevitable dives, but that slowed the snowball meta, so our items and our shields got nerfed."

these champs still do prevent dives also the nerfs were completely warranted.
the heal/shield powercreep was absolutely insane.

also PROTIP
{{champion:44}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:78}}   are supposed to be "hard peel" supports

> [{quoted}](name=Ayame Isaki,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8ffxaE41,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-09T16:39:51.106+0000)
>
> {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}}: "We used to save ADCs from those inevitable dives, but that slowed the snowball meta, so our items and our shields got nerfed."

Like more than half of Lulu's Kit got raped over like 2 years, feels bad man. Janna is going to feel the wrath of Lulu's Past.

But in all seriousness, Supports being strong suppressed all other roles from snowballing: It made it so that if you did extremely well top and mid, you couldn't solo carry: but if you got fed as an ADC you basically became a god. Supports SHOULD stop snowballing when they're around, that's like, you know, what they do.

I think it's more the imbalance of ADC lead to the supports demise, the playerbase is a lot more submissive and 'yesman' than ADC who are literal steroid junkies.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8ffxaE41,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-09T16:15:22.466+0000)

ADC and some squishy mages I feel. Mages in Mid, but more so in bot.
yeah some ones like {{champion:161}} have it just as bad.
what about imobile mages ;~;
So towers are supposed to be unkillable gods and if someone gets 5man dove by himself hes supposed to get a penta because his tower can 1 shot everyone?
Do I even need to comment how this is a strawman?

> [{quoted}](name=Xäyąh,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8ffxaE41,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-07-09T23:31:16.814+0000)

Do explain.

> [{quoted}](name=Fk me Ahri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8ffxaE41,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2018-07-10T11:29:06.395+0000)
>
> Do explain.

Strawman is a logical fallacy where a person weakens someone elses point with a distortion or weakening of info and attacks that point.
OP never stated that towers are supposed to be strong enough to score pentakills. Instead of having a meaningfull argument, you pulled a comment out of your ass that attacks a point the OP didn't make.
At this time, they stand no chance of mating.

Same for mages vs assassins. Funny part is that while bot gets doved by 2-3 people, mid gets doved by 1 assassin and sometimes the jungler comes in for some free assists.

Nothing to do with ADCs, all to do with the high amounts of random damage in this game because of masteries, buffed ignite, nerfed defensive summoners, and damage creep from champion/items

> [{quoted}](name=Krotux,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8ffxaE41,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-09T16:31:44.083+0000)
>
> Same for mages vs assassins. Funny part is that while bot gets doved by 2-3 people, mid gets doved by 1 assassin and sometimes the jungler comes in for some free assists.
> 
> Nothing to do with ADCs, all to do with the high amounts of random damage in this game because of masteries, buffed ignite, nerfed defensive summoners, and damage creep from champion/items

It's a combination of a lot of things

* Burst damage
* Assassin balance in general.
* Towers are terrible at protecting allies.
* Risk to reward ratio on Tower diving is heavily favored to reward. There's next to no risk.

Take Bot Lane for example.

Champions like {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} and items like {{item:3047}}  are meant to be counters to champions like Assassin's.

But this is Riot Games.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

> [{quoted}](name=Krotux,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8ffxaE41,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-09T16:31:44.083+0000)
>
> Same for mages vs assassins. Funny part is that while bot gets doved by 2-3 people, mid gets doved by 1 assassin and sometimes the jungler comes in for some free assists.
> 
> Nothing to do with ADCs, all to do with the high amounts of random damage in this game because of masteries, buffed ignite, nerfed defensive summoners, and damage creep from champion/items

Except mages are incredibly overpowered and cc anyone trying to dive them, zyonyas, pool away, etc.

most hard CC skillshots are also so slow that assassins can blink, dash or even walk out of the way of them

for instance, try hitting a zed with Anivia's Q

try hitting an Ekko with velkoz's knock up

there are very few mages with targeted hard CC  and most of them have traded power for safety

take twisted fate for instance, he's good at roaming, punishing early, stopping ganks and etc while having a targeted stun.  His targeted stun is also delayed and his kit has a total power of 1/4th to 1/5th of a ziggs with identical items
Tower damage is fine, but the rate at which they fire needs to be increased. Base towers need to be buffed for sure.

I might lose 500 games this season, but I wont stop playing my vayne and lucians. 
suck it riot. I don't care about your meta!
You're not wrong about flies and ADCs, cause they have a memory span of 9 seconds before forgetting wtf they are doing :D
we cri evrytahm {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}}
{{champion:223}} :  looks like a four course meal to me, mmm, mmm
So you are saying we should get rid of towers?{{champion:83}}
What’s an ADC?
Its really bad when two squishies can dive someone under turret in Silver and both live while getting the kill under lvl 10

If they or their support would bother to stop the opposing champs while they have dealt damage to them, it would result in the tower being able to lob a hefty amount of damage at them. If you can't work with a tower which is never going to let you down then either you're picking the wrong champs or you're panicking. Of course, in general, I do believe it is a mistake to think that letting the wave be at your tower is good for you. It's not.

Towers do offer relative safety, but you need to put in some work yourself. If youre low HP, they arent going to save you. If youre by yourself with no utility, again, not gunna save you. 

Its not that towers do no/little damage, or are weaker, its just that people got better at managing tower agro and judging when its actually safe to dive with how many shots they can take.
